globalstripe-011723

details.title: DETAILS
descriptive: Non GMO fresh dog food, gently cooked with all natural ingredients
No Preservatives, Meat Meals or By-Product Meals
Complete & Balanced for All Life Stages

directions.title: DIRECTIONS
directions.directions: This recipe is fully cooked ready to serve! Store in the refrigerator and use within 7 days of opening. No heating or defrosting required. Feeding Instructions: Depending on the age, activity level, and condition of your dog, the feeding guidelines will need to be adjusted. The normal daily feeding amount for a healthy adult dog: 4-10 lb. dog feed 1/2 - 3/4 cups per day, 11-20 lb. dog feed 3/4 - 1 1/2 cups per day, 21-35 lb. dog feed 1 1/2 - 2 1/4 cups per day, 36-50 lb. dog feed 2 1/4 - 3 cups per day, 51-65 lb. dog feed 3 -3 1/2 cups per day, dogs +25 lb. +1 cup per day.

1221520.fullDimensions: 8.66 IN L X 3.25 IN W X 9.25 IN H

ingredients.title: INGREDIENTS & ANALYSIS
ingredients: Chicken, Sweet Potato, Carrots, Pea Protein, Ground Oats, Natural Flavors, Green Beans, Cranberries, Vinegar, Carrageenan, Cassia, Salt, Potassium Chloride, Minerals (Zinc Proteinate, Iron Proteinate, Copper Proteinate, Manganese Proteinate, Sodium Selenite, Calcium Iodate), Vitamins (Choline Chloride, Vitamin E Supplement, Vitamin A Supplement, Niacin, Calcium Pantothenate, Biotin, Thiamine Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Vitamin B12 Supplement, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Folic Acid), Spinach.
guaranteedAnalysis: Crude Protein 18.0% Minimum Crude Fat 6.5% Minimum Crude Fiber 1.0% Maximum Moisture 68.0% Maximum

product.longDescription: Made with tender shreds of fresh 100% natural chicken and antioxidant-rich sweet potatoes, carrots, cranberries, green beans and spinach. High in protein and the next best thing to a home cooked meal!
